options.help: Send a trap when CPU usage is high.
options.name: cpu-high

options.help: Send a trap when available memory is low.
options.name: mem-low

options.help: Send a trap when log disk space becomes low.
options.name: log-full

options.help: Send a trap when an interface IP address is changed.
options.name: intf-ip

options.help: Send a trap when a VPN tunnel comes up.
options.name: vpn-tun-up

options.help: Send a trap when a VPN tunnel goes down.
options.name: vpn-tun-down

options.help: Send a trap after an HA failover when the backup unit has taken over.
options.name: ha-switch

options.help: Send a trap when HA heartbeats are not received.
options.name: ha-hb-failure

options.help: Send a trap when IPS detects an attack.
options.name: ips-signature

options.help: Send a trap when IPS finds an anomaly.
options.name: ips-anomaly

options.help: Send a trap when AntiVirus finds a virus.
options.name: av-virus

options.help: Send a trap when AntiVirus finds an oversized file.
options.name: av-oversize

options.help: Send a trap when AntiVirus finds file matching pattern.
options.name: av-pattern

options.help: Send a trap when AntiVirus finds a fragmented file.
options.name: av-fragmented

options.help: Send a trap when FortiManager interface changes. Send a FortiManager trap.
options.name: fm-if-change

options.help: Send a trap when a configuration change is made by a FortiGate administrator and the FortiGate is managed by FortiManager.
options.name: fm-conf-change

options.help: Send a trap when a BGP FSM transitions to the established state.
options.name: bgp-established

options.help: Send a trap when a BGP FSM goes from a high numbered state to a lower numbered state.
options.name: bgp-backward-transition

options.help: Send a trap when an HA cluster member goes up.
options.name: ha-member-up

options.help: Send a trap when an HA cluster member goes down.
options.name: ha-member-down

options.help: Send a trap when an entity MIB change occurs (RFC4133).
options.name: ent-conf-change

options.help: Send a trap when the FortiGate enters conserve mode.
options.name: av-conserve

options.help: Send a trap when the FortiGate enters bypass mode.
options.name: av-bypass

options.help: Send a trap when AntiVirus passes an oversized file.
options.name: av-oversize-passed

options.help: Send a trap when AntiVirus blocks an oversized file.
options.name: av-oversize-blocked

options.help: Send a trap when the IPS signature database or engine is updated.
options.name: ips-pkg-update

options.help: Send a trap when the IPS network buffer is full.
options.name: ips-fail-open

options.help: Send a trap when a temperature sensor registers a temperature that is too high.
options.name: temperature-high

options.help: Send a trap when a voltage sensor registers a voltage that is outside of the normal range.
options.name: voltage-alert

options.help: Send a trap when a power supply fails.
options.name: power-supply-failure

options.help: Send a trap when a FortiAnalyzer disconnects from the FortiGate.
options.name: faz-disconnect

options.help: Send a trap when a fan fails.
options.name: fan-failure

options.help: Send a trap when a managed FortiAP comes up.
options.name: wc-ap-up

options.help: Send a trap when a managed FortiAP goes down.
options.name: wc-ap-down

options.help: Send a trap when a FortiSwitch controller session comes up.
options.name: fswctl-session-up

options.help: Send a trap when a FortiSwitch controller session goes down.
options.name: fswctl-session-down

options.help: Send a trap when a server load balance real server goes down.
options.name: load-balance-real-server-down

options.help: Send a trap when a new device is found.
options.name: device-new

options.help: Send a trap when per-CPU usage is high.
options.name: per-cpu-high

ha-direct.help: Enable/disable direct management of HA cluster members.
ha-direct.name: ha-direct

options.help: Enable setting.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable setting.
options.name: disable

host-type.help: Control whether the SNMP manager sends SNMP queries, receives SNMP traps, or both.
host-type.name: host-type

options.help: Accept queries from and send traps to this SNMP manager.
options.name: any

options.help: Accept queries from this SNMP manager but do not send traps.
options.name: query

options.help: Send traps to this SNMP manager but do not accept SNMP queries from this SNMP manager.
options.name: trap

ip.help: IPv4 address of the SNMP manager (host).
ip.name: ip

source-ip.help: Source IPv4 address for SNMP traps.
source-ip.name: source-ip
